ground_truth.thought: 分析这些政策对环境保护的影响
ground_truth.name: Analysis.impact_on_environment

args.policy: The government has announced new reforms to the environmental tax system

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'Government.get_environmental_tax_announcement', 'description': 'Get the latest government announcement regarding environmental tax reforms.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'Type of announcement to fetch'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'announcement', 'description': 'the text of the latest announcement'}]}, {'name': 'Analysis.impact_on_environment', 'description': 'Analyze the impact of a given policy on the environment.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'policy', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The policy text to analyze'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'impact', 'description': 'the analysis of the impact on the environment'}]}, {'name': 'TaxOffice.get_local_tax_rate', 'description': 'Get the environmental tax rate for a specific region.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'region', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The region to query for tax rates'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'rate', 'description': 'the environmental tax rate for the region'}]}, {'name': 'ElectronicTaxOffice.tax_declaration', 'description': 'Guide on how to declare environmental tax through the electronic tax office.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'procedure', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The procedure to follow'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'guide', 'description': 'the step-by-step guide for tax declaration'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我需要了解中国环境保护税的最新动态。首先，获取最新的关于环境保护税改革的政府公告。然后，分析这些政策对环境保护的影响。接着，查询我所在地区的环境保护税率。最后，了解如何通过电子税务局进行环境保护税的申报。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取最新的关于环境保护税改革的政府公告
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'q'的值是什么?
{'announcement': 'The government has announced new reforms to the environmental tax system, aiming to increase the tax rates on high-emission industries.'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'announcement': 'The government has announced new reforms to the environmental tax system, aiming to increase the tax rates on high-emission industries.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?

prediction: 当前这一步的目标是获取最新的关于环境保护税改革的政府公告。
